items.title: How the Charlie Kirk shooting unfolded – in maps, videos and images
items.summary: <p>Conservative activist and Trump ally was shot dead at a Utah Valley University event on Wednesday</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shot-latest-news-updates-utah-university-donald-trump">Charlie Kirk shooting – latest updates</a></p></li></ul><p>The conservative American activist Charlie Kirk, a podcast commentator and influential ally of Donald Trump, <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-police-search-for-suspect-amid-condemnation-of-targeted-killing">was shot dead on Wednesday</a> while speaking at Utah Valley University.</p><p>The university is located in the city of Orem, about 40 miles south of the Utah state capital Salt Lake City.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-maps-videos-images">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Charlie Kirk shooting latest: search for killer under way as Trump vows crackdown on ‘political violence’
items.summary: <p>In an address delivered before the person who killed Kirk had even been identified, Donald Trump blamed ‘the radical left’ for the shooting</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-police-search-for-suspect-amid-condemnation-of-targeted-killing">Police search for suspect amid condemnation of ‘targeted’ killing</a></p></li><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-death-political-violence-aftermath">‘What have we become?’: shock across US political parties</a></p></li></ul><p>A <strong>UK</strong> offshoot of a <strong>US</strong> conservative group set up by <strong>Charlie</strong> <strong>Kirk</strong> is to hold a vigil in <strong>London</strong> after he was shot dead, reports the PA news agency.</p><p><strong>Turning Point UK</strong> has said its activists will gather on Friday evening by the <strong>Montgomery statue</strong> in <strong>Whitehall</strong> and called on others to “join us in remembering Charlie”.</p><p>It’s absolutely shocking, we’re heartbroken over here in the UK.</p><p>My thoughts this evening are with the loved ones of Charlie Kirk.</p><p>It is heartbreaking that a young family has been robbed of a father and a husband.</p><p>Political violence has no place in our societies.</p><p>Our thoughts and condolences are with his family.</p><p>An atrocious murder, a deep wound for democracy and for those who believe in freedom.</p><p>My condolences to his family, to his loved ones, and to the American conservative community.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shot-latest-news-updates-utah-university-donald-trump">Continue reading...</a>
